shortdesc.ph: Type of custom audio capture track.
Type of custom audio capture track.
Types of custom audio capture tracks.
Type of custom audio capture track.

plentry.pd: 0: Mixable audio track. Supports mixing with other audio streams (e.g., microphone-captured audio) before local playback or publishing to the channel. Has higher latency compared to non-mixable audio tracks.

1: Non-mixable audio track. Replaces microphone capture and does not support mixing with other audio streams. Has lower latency compared to mixable audio tracks. If AudioTrackDirect is specified, publishMicrophoneTrack in must be set to when calling , otherwise joining the channel will fail and return error code -2.
0: Mixable audio track. Supports mixing with other audio streams (e.g., microphone audio) before local playback or publishing to the channel. Has higher latency compared to non-mixable audio tracks.

1: Non-mixable audio track. Replaces microphone capture and does not support mixing with other audio streams. Has lower latency compared to mixable audio tracks. If you specify AudioTrackDirect, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack in to when calling , otherwise joining the channel will fail and return error code -2.

0: Mixable audio track. Supports mixing with other audio streams (e.g., microphone-captured audio) before local playback or publishing to the channel. Has higher latency compared to non-mixable tracks.

1: Non-mixable audio track. Replaces microphone capture and does not support mixing with other audio streams. Has lower latency compared to mixable tracks. If audioTrackDirect is specified, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack in to when calling , otherwise joining the channel fails and returns error code -2.
0: Mixable audio track. Supports mixing with other audio streams (e.g., microphone audio) before playing locally or publishing to the channel. Higher latency compared to non-mixable tracks.

1: Non-mixable audio track. Replaces microphone capture and does not support mixing with other audio streams. Lower latency compared to mixable tracks. If AUDIO_TRACK_DIRECT is specified, you must set publishMicrophoneTrack to in when calling ; otherwise, joining the channel fails and returns error code -2.
